description.p: It is the distant future тАУ the year 2000. Evil robots are trying to kill you. Avoid the robots or face certain death.
To je dalekoj budu─Зnosti - Godina 2000. Zli roboti poku┼бavaju vas ubiti. Izbjegavajte robote ili se suo─Нite sigurnom smr─Зu.
